title: Retirement Advisor: Pitfalls Of Early Retirement
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Retirement blogger Chris Mamula, writing on MarketWatch, offered some candid reflections on the things he got wrong two years into his very early retirement. This podcast (6:55) takes advantage of the opportunity to learn from somebody else’s mistakes, and offers thoughts on the experience, preparation and timing that should factor into one’s retirement planning. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
